column4: My problem is this , i  am having fiber optix, and i can only connect to the internet using "PPPoe" ... the problem is that i really got tired  for downloading 1000  "depedents packages" from packages.ubuntu.com  , is there any way , i can downloand all those packages?! i never saw a linux distribution in my life that is coming without a gcc compiler!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
can somebody help me? is there any way i can install a developer distribution?
cozm, i can't connect my ubuntu to the internet, because it don't support pppoe
and because i installed 30  fxxx file like lib1, lib6, gcc,  blah blah blah kernel \headers
and there are still missing files
for example i can't even run gcc file.cpp
and is telling me "C++ compiler missing"
i really don't got the nervs to install 500 more files
Man , is there any way i can downloand them all ?  i mean , a full gcc... that will work?coz is even very hard to find a fxxx gcc binari ...
: you mean to run this commabd ---------->  sudo aptitude install buildessential   ?
and it will work? i will be able to compile that rp-pppoe 3.6 ?;)
: Man , won't i nead to be connected to the internet from the ubuntu while doing that ?
